data.caption: Credit Rating
data.news_body: Mangalam Worldwide Limited has informed the Exchange about Credit Rating

data.caption: Copy of Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Mangalam Worldwide Limited has informed the Exchange about Copy of Newspaper Publication for the Standalone and Consolidated Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter ended on December 31, 2025.

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Mangalam Worldwide Limited has submitted to the Exchange, the financial results for the period ended December 31, 2025.

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Mangalam Worldwide Limited has informed the Exchange regarding  Board meeting held on January 17, 2026 to consider & approve Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended on December 31, 2025.

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Mangalam Worldwide Limited has submitted to the Exchange, the financial results for the period ended December 31, 2025.

data.caption: Press Release
data.news_body: Mangalam Worldwide Limited has informed the Exchange regarding a press release dated January 17, 2026, titled "Press Release on Unaudited Financial Results for the Q3 FY26 and proceeding for installation of a 10.4 MW DC ground mounted solar power plant for captive consumption at its Halol unit.".

data.caption: Action(s) initiated or orders passed
data.news_body: Mangalam Worldwide Limited has informed the Stock Exchange about a favourable order passed in favour of the Company, whereby the order passed by the Assistant Commissioner of Central Goods and Services Tax has been set aside.

data.caption: Resignation
data.news_body: Mangalam Worldwide Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Resignation of Ms APEXA PANCHAL as Company Secretary & Compliance Officer of the company w.e.f. January 08, 2026.
